title: Top Five Adam Sandler Movies and ‘Hustle’
description:
Sean is joined by Rob Harvilla to discuss Adam Sandler, his new Netflix NBA drama ‘Hustle,’ and share their top Sandler movies of all time.

Host: Sean Fennessey
Guest: Rob Harvilla
Producer: Bobby Wagner
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
